text: DOCA Studios is a Russian video game developer and publisher. It is part of a larger consortium of Zelenograd companies created around scientific and technical creativity. This group was created under direction from the USSR government. == Titles (incomplete) == * Shortline (1992) *BabyType (1993) *Sadko (1993) *SeaBattle: Admiral Guardian (1994) * Black Zone (1995) * Total Control (1995) *Противостояние (1997) == References == Category:Video game companies of Russia
title: Doca (video game developer)
